tool_description: 🧵 Fast and stable Threads API. Scrape any information from Threads: user info, feed, replies and more. Don't miss! Custom plans and crypto payments are available on request – feel free to contact us https://t.me/rocketapi or contact@rocketapi.io. We will be happy to help you integrate the API into your system.
name: RocketAPI for Threads
title: RocketAPI for Threads

api_list.name: Get Thread Replies
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rocketapi-for-threads.p.rapidapi.com/threads/thread/get_replies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rocketapi-for-threads.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
